evidence.text: NOTICE OF APPEAL TO DC CIRCUIT COURT as to 36 Order on Motion for Preliminary Injunction, 37 Memorandum & Opinion by MARCO RUBIO, U.S. DEPARTMENT OF STATE, OFFICE OF PERSONNEL MANAGEMENT, CHARLES EZELL, DONALD J. TRUMP, U.S. AGENCY FOR INTERNATIONAL DEVELOPMENT.
